text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: For the day off, I thank you sincerely! Thanks to you, I got an excellent night's sleep!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! How about you, Traniner? It's recommended to read a book before bed to have a peaceful slumber…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A textbook!! I'll lend you my copy!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Not only does it prep you for a review, but it also puts you to sleep… As expected of every honor roll student's bible!
Looks like Sakura Bakushin O got a good night's sleep on her day off!
